product_name: YETI Bear Proof Cooler Locks - Package of 2
long_description: Turn your YETI Tundra or Roadie cooler (sold separately) into a bear-resistant container with this set of 2 Master Lock locks. Interagency Grizzly Bear Committee certifies YETI Tundra and Roadie coolers as bear-resistant food containers when used with padlocks on both front corners. Front corners of Tundra and Roadie coolers are have holes that accept locks to ensure the lids stay shut. Package includes 2 locks and 2 keys.
short_description: Turn your YETI Tundra or Roadie cooler (sold separately) into a bear-resistant container with this set of 2 Master Lock locks.
